Question.Subject: Do I need internet service for ventones?
Question.Content: I don't need anyother suggestions of sites where you can get ringtones- all I need is a YES or a NO. Do you need internet service on your phone to download ringtones from ventones?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
no, ventones has some carriers that are use as ringtones without internet, try go inside ventones, find your carrier or phone. you will have your ringtones sent to your phone.
http://www.ventones.com

Answer.Content:
no, ventones has some carriers that are use as ringtones without internet, try go inside ventones, find your carrier or phone. you will have your ringtones sent to your phone.
http://www.ventones.com
Answer.Reference: ventones a free and safe site
